abstract: Young protesters overran an oil pipeline hub in the volatile Niger Delta, cutting Nigeria’s oil production by about 30 percent.
snippet: Young protesters overran an oil pipeline hub in the volatile Niger Delta, cutting Nigeria’s oil production by about 30 percent.
lead_paragraph: NDJAMENA, Chad, May 15  Young protesters have overrun an oil pipeline hub in the volatile Niger Delta, the authorities said, helping to cut Nigeria’s oil production by about 30 percent as the country weathers a period of instability after a deeply flawed election last month.

headline.main: Nigerian Oil Production Falls After a Pipeline Hub Is Overrun
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Oil Production Falls After a Pipeline Hub Is Overrun
